EmailTemplate.name: 2019_Primus_Elite_Keselowski_Campaign.2019_Email_Keselowski_Weekly_A_mih
EmailTemplate.subject: Learn How Honeywell Helps Brad Keselowski Get to the Green Flag
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> How does Brad Keselowski get to the Green Flag on time?
On his Honeywell-equipped Lear 45! Brad Keselowski's Lear 45 has been upgraded with the Primus Elite DU-875 liquid crystal displays, mandate-compliant ADS-B, GoDirect Flight Sentinel and an XM satellite weather package.
The new DU-875 displays are easy to install, are brighter and last longer, reduce weight, and increase Aircraft Blue Book value -- which Brad's accountant loves. Just as Brad and his pit crew continually adjust his car as track conditions change, Honeywell's satellite weather and flight data packages provide continuous weather and traffic information to Brad's pilots. Flight plans can be adjusted as conditions change, assuring Brad is always there ready for the green flag. To learn more about how you can experience the same in-flight edge that Brad enjoys, contact Honeywell today.
LEARN MORE <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/2019_Primus_Elite_Keselowski_Campaign_Landing-Page.html]]>
